data.name: Fixed Rate Car Loan
data.description: With our car loan you can purchase or refinance the vehicle of your dreams, whether it's a new or used vehicle up to 10 years old.

features.additionalInfo: Choose weekly, fortnightly or monthly repayments
24/7 access via internet banking and mobile app
Loan can be used to buy towable caravans, boats, motor cycles or classic cars
Accessories like a car navigation system, alarm and your car insurance can be added to the loan
Application Fee of $100 is waived for a limited time

eligibility.additionalInfo: You must be a member. Membership is open to citizens of Australia over age of 18 and are current or retired employees or volunteers in Education, Health Care or Emergency Services sectors or be studying at or have graduated from an Australian University or are family members of members (i.e. shareholders) of the Hiver.

eligibility.additionalValue: Individuals must be citizens of Australia.

eligibility.additionalInfo: All applications for credit are subject to responsible lending criteria. Fees and charges apply. You can find our Consumer Lending terms and conditions online or from any of our offices.

Important - If you have or operate on an existing account with Firefighters Mutual Bank, Health Professionals Bank, Teachers Mutual Bank or UniBank you will be unable to obtain a Hiver product or service.

fees.name: ARREARS_ADMINISTRATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable each time staff action a loan account, RediCredit or Credit Card account in arrears.

fees.name: ACCOUNT_FUNCTIONS
fees.additionalInfo: $50 per hour (minimum charge $25). Additional accounting services on your account at your request.

fees.name: MEMBER_TRACE_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable by debit to your account, each time we undertake a search to locate you following a payment default if you changed your address without notifying us.

fees.name: BREAK_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on early repayment i.e. during the fixed rate period if you repay the loan in full, you repay part of the loan or you switch from this loan type to another loan type. Please refer to clause 3B of the Consumer Lending terms and conditions for details of how this fee is calculated. At Cost.
